definitions: relating to or characterized by the exclusion of something, especially from a contract or group

examples.text: there should be no exclusionary language

shortDefinitions: relating to or characterized by the exclusion of something

definitions: relating to an item or eventuality specifically not covered by an insurance policy or other contract

examples.text: an exclusionary rule barring liability of the police for negligence

shortDefinitions: relating to item or eventuality specifically not covered by insurance policy
